title: Malian on war crimes trial for ruining historic sites
text:
Published By: Al Jazeera - Today 
In the first case of its kind, Ahmad al-Faqi al-Mahdi is tried at the ICC over destruction of Timbuktu mosque and tombs.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
